trans-unit.source: By default, new members are disabled and have to be enabled by an administrator. If you want them to be able to self-activate their account, use this checkbox.
trans-unit.target: By default, new members are disabled and have to be enabled by an administrator. If you want them to be able to self-activate their account, use this checkbox.

trans-unit.source: This notification is sent after the activation process (double opt-in) was completed.
trans-unit.target: This notification is sent after the activation process (double opt-in) was completed.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to configure a different redirect page after successful activation.
trans-unit.target: Allows you to configure a different redirect page after successful activation.

trans-unit.source: It allows you to configure a different page for password resets. By default, the reset link redirects to the same page. However, you can specify a different page here, enabling you to use unique content elements. Ensure you include this module again on the specified page.
trans-unit.target: It allows you to configure a different page for password resets. By default, the reset link redirects to the same page. However, you can specify a different page here, enabling you to use unique content elements. Ensure you include this module again on the specified page.
